description: cap embroidered in brown, pink, gold, red, and tan with tree design within a pyramid on each quadrant; designs separated by a strip of triangles in same colors;  circular design on lower third: crosses within circles; three decorative bands around bottom edge are geometric; gold metallic thread between top and bottom sections and in two decorative rows at bottom; small tassel at back; underlying fabric gathered into rows before embroidery
dimension: 6 3/8 x 7 3/4 x 7 3/4 in. (16.19 x 19.69 x 19.69 cm) (without tassels)
title: Hat
